comment.description: The comment of the history entry

dateCreated.description: The creation-date of the history entry

description.description: The human readable description of the history entry

dvinciUserId.description: The dvinci user who has triggered the history entry

externalId.description: The unique identifier of the external system.

externalUser.description: A display name for a user, who does not exists in the dvinci system.

type.description: The type of the history entry.

fromApplicationStatusId.description: Source application status on application status change operations. Property only exists for types: APPLICATION_ENTRY, APPLICATION_STATUS_CHANGE, APPLICATION_AUTO_STATUS_CHANGE

toApplicationStatusId.description: Destination application status on application status change operations. Property only exists for types: APPLICATION_ENTRY, APPLICATION_STATUS_CHANGE, APPLICATION_AUTO_STATUS_CHANGE
